name: Weather App
desc: A weather forecast application using API integration to show real-time weather data based on user location or search.

name: Music Player App
desc: A custom-built music player app with play, pause, and playlist features, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Blog Website
desc: A personal blog site featuring recent posts, categories, and interactive features like like/bookmark.

name: Road Accident Analysis
desc: Data analysis project using Python and Power BI to visualize road accident trends and safety insights.

name: Social Media Trend Analysis
desc: A data science project to analyze viral trends using NLP, sentiment analysis, and keyword extraction.

name: Customer Support Data Analysis
desc: Analyzed customer satisfaction and resolution rates using sentiment analysis and weekly trend dashboards.
